text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son...
In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Trust in the LORD with all thine heart, and lean not unto thine own understanding.
And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God...
But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength...
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves...
And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death...
I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded, for I know that the Lord giveth no commandments unto the children of men...
Adam fell that men might be; and men are, that they might have joy.
And behold, I tell you these things that ye may learn wisdom; that ye may learn that when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
And now as I said concerning faithâ€”faith is not to have a perfect knowledge of things; therefore if ye have faith ye hope for things which are not seen...
And now, my sons, remember, remember that it is upon the rock of our Redeemer, who is Christ, the Son of God, that ye must build your foundation...
Behold, I am Jesus Christ, whom the prophets testified shall come into the world.
And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness...
Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not...
Wherefore, my beloved brethren, pray unto the Father with all the energy of heart...
And we talk of Christ, we rejoice in Christ, we preach of Christ...
